text: Railadevi Lake (or Railadevi Talav) is an lake situated in the city of Thane in the state of Maharashtra, India. It is one of 35 lakes in Thane, which is known as the "city of lakes"."Environment ministry officials visit Railadevi Lake", Times of India, 21 November 2002. Accessed 8 December 2014 ==References== Category:Geography of Thane district Category:Lakes of Maharashtra Category:Lakes of Thane
title: Railadevi Lake
